content.raw:
Nice! With this PR I can switch between Ogre 1 and 2 just by changing the param on SDF :smiley: 

Approving, but we should wait for happy CI to merge.
content.html:
Nice! With this PR I can switch between Ogre 1 and 2 just by changing the param on SDF

Approving, but we should wait for happy CI to merge.

content.raw: yeah I’ll wait for the ign-cmake PR to be merged first and make a new ign-cmake prerelease
content.html: yeah I’ll wait for the ign-cmake PR to be merged first and make a new ign-cmake prerelease

content.raw: I'm having trouble compiling this branch and gz11 against ogre2 on homebrew, but let's save that for later. I'll continue testing with bionic
content.html: I'm having trouble compiling this branch and gz11 against ogre2 on homebrew, but let's save that for later. I'll continue testing with bionic

content.raw:
I see a test failure in `UNIT_Scene_TEST` with ogre2 that leads to an infinite recursion:

~~~
[ RUN      ] Scene/SceneTest.NodeCycle/ogre2
[Err] [BaseNode.hh:170] Cannot add self as a child node
[Err] [BaseNode.hh:170] Cannot add self as a child node
UNIT_Scene_TEST: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ogre-2.1-debbuilder/repo/OgreMain/src/Math/Array/OgreArrayMemoryManager.cpp:232: void Ogre::ArrayMemoryManager::destroySlot(const char*, Ogre::uint8): Assertion `slot < mMaxMemory && "This slot does not belong to this ArrayMemoryManager"' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~

with gdb:

content.raw:
I restarted the jenkins windows build with the gazebodistro branch parameter, and it's failing to find a `GL/glext.h` header file included by BaseScene.cc

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_rendering-pr-win&build=138)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_rendering-pr-win/138/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_rendering-pr-win/138/
content.html:
I restarted the jenkins windows build with the gazebodistro branch parameter, and it's failing to find a GL/glext.h header file included by BaseScene.cc

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_rendering-pr-win/138/

content.raw:
fixed as of ign-cmake commit [460c42e](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/commits/460c42e88a9e19f88fd6b43e8bf4efa00619b563)

[new windows build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_rendering-pr-win/149/) - build is red due to a colcon error at the end not sure why but ign-rendering now compiles fine and all tests are passing
content.html:
fixed as of ign-cmake commit 460c42e

new windows build - build is red due to a colcon error at the end not sure why but ign-rendering now compiles fine and all tests are passing
